BESA.Remote

Class PingThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • BESA.Remote.PingThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PingSocketThread

    public class PingThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class represents PingThread manejo del envio quasi-periodico de los mensajes de multicast
    Since:
    JDK1.0
